scripts.webp:png: for file in $(find assets/img -name '*.png'); do ./node_modules/.bin/cwebp -lossless -q 80 $file -o public/$file.webp -short; done
scripts.webp:jpg: for file in $(find assets/img -name '*.jpg'); do ./node_modules/.bin/cwebp -q 80 $file -o public/$file.webp -short; done;
scripts.webp:gif: for file in $(find assets/img -name '*.gif'); do gif2webp $file -o source/$file.webp; done;
scripts.webp: npm run webp:png && npm run webp:jpg && npm run webp:gif
scripts.stats:css:
echo "--------------
Size of main.css is $(stat -c%s "source/assets/css/main.css") bytes ($(gzip -c source/assets/css/main.css | wc -c) bytes gzipped)
--------------"
scripts.stats:js:
echo "--------------
Size of main.js is $(stat -c%s "source/assets/js/main.js") bytes ($(gzip -c source/assets/js/main.js | wc -c) bytes gzipped)
--------------"
scripts.stats: npm run stats:css --silent && npm run stats:js --silent
scripts.init: npm run fonts --silent & npm run images --silent & npm run sass --silent & npm run serviceWorker --silent & npm run rollup --silent && npm run webp --silent
scripts.build: npm run clean --silent && npm run init --silent && npm run stats --silent
